Bash(git commit -m "Fix auto-increment INSERT queries across 26 files - MySQL 8 compatibility

Problem:
- Multiple files using INSERT INTO ... VALUES('''', ...) for auto-increment
- MySQL 8.0 strict mode rejects empty string '''' for integer columns
- Causes ''Incorrect integer value'' errors throughout the application

Solution:
- Created fix_auto_increment.php automated script
- Changed all VALUES('''', to VALUES(NULL, in 25 files
- NULL is correct value for auto-increment columns in MySQL 8
